definition: lit. moonlight group/fig. those who spend their monthly income even before they earn their next salary (slang)
to live in hiding/living as a recluse/to hide from the world

sentences.english: However, the moonlit glare washes this rather faint constellation from the sky tonight.
sentences.chinese: 儘管如此，月光洗去了今晚天際中星星們昏暗的光。

sentences.english: In the autumn, bringing a moon, I loved.
sentences.chinese: 中秋夜，皎潔的月光，讓我倍思親。

sentences.english: If you spend all the money you get, you will have to depend on pension when old.
sentences.chinese: 若把所有錢都“月光”掉，老了將只能靠養老金。

sentences.english: The moonlight is still quiet, only a dim.
sentences.chinese: 月光依舊是清幽，只是多了一抹黯淡。

sentences.english: White flowers glimmered in the moonlight.
sentences.chinese: 白色的花在月光下閃爍着。

sentences.english: Standing on the bridge, he could see the river waves sparkling in the moonlight.
sentences.chinese: 站在橋上，他可以看見河水在月光下閃耀。

sentences.english: The moonlight poured in through the windows.
sentences.chinese: 月光透過窗戶瀉入室內。

sentences.english: The ocean looks very beautiful. The moonlight glimmers on its surface.
sentences.chinese: 海洋真美，月光在海面上閃躍。

sentences.english: May the moon bear witness that the moonlit love is but perfection.
sentences.chinese: 邀明月，愛在月光下完美。

sentences.english: Moon lights made the sea gleam like satin.
sentences.chinese: 月光把海水照得像綢子一般。

sentences.english: Mother was in her chair by the window, her body defined by a thin ray of moonlight.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽靠窗坐在椅子上，她的身體罩了一層薄薄地月光。

sentences.english: Moonlight holly, the Soppho Comet, Angel's tears below a tree.
sentences.chinese: 月光冬青，莎孚彗星，天使的眼淚垂落樹下。

sentences.english: All love to be out by the light of the moon.
sentences.chinese: 它們都愛在月光下出來遊蕩。

sentences.english: This year could be, so she's "Clair de Lune group" to start the "customer accounts.
sentences.chinese: 可今年，她這樣的“月光族”開始做起了“賬客”。

sentences.english: Temple before the show and a distant relative, Reliance behind Mau Lam Xiuzhu Moonlight Hill.
sentences.chinese: 前與秀山寺遙遙相對，背後倚茂林修竹的月光山。

definition: bright moon/refers to 夜明珠, a legendary pearl that can glow in the dark/CL:輪|轮[lun2]
night scene/the dim light of night
